divs: Sighting Detailsat 10:30 pm observed out window looking east...saw these glowing objects...I have astronomy interest so I know planets , fireballs, bolides and the like when I see them. Never saw anything like this. Possible chinese lanterns but much smaller then I would imagine them...and not moving. Observed about 15 minutes then they just faded away.
Summary: arc of seven lights hovering in east..four faded three left bright red in center two orange at edges
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around September 14th 2012
